Welcome to Spectrum Lab

World-class scientific research in cutting-edge signal and image processing, Healthcare AI areas

  • Get Started

About Us

Our quest is to discover the beauty of signals that we come across in many disciplines of science and engineering, regardless of the dimension of the space they live in.

Research and Projects

Our lab specializes in signal/image processing theory, wavelets, denoising, microphone arrays, sampling theories, time-frequency analysis, statistical signal processing, bio-inspired signal processing, healthcare informatics, biomedical imaging, inverse problems, etc. We primarily focus on speech/audio/image, bio-acoustic, biomedical, and optical signals.
